package.name: BigSurCenter控制中心美化-Rootless
package.shortDescription: BigSurCenter replaces the default iOS control center with a new lightweight and elegant one inspired by the control center in MacOS Big Sur控制中心美化，非常的好看，已汉化，国内全能玩机源免费首发，感谢cypwn大神！大家先尝尝鲜吧！如果你是盗版的话，遇到什么问题可以进群反馈，等待更新！
